text:
Ticketleap | Software Engineer | Philadelphia, PA

Tim here, CEO at Ticketleap. We're looking to add 1 person to our engineering team. We're currently building a new product line, for which we have some high aiming goals. If you're in Philly (or looking for a new place to call home), I'd love to grab a few minutes to chat over the phone or a cup of coffee. Apply here and mention HN.

http://ticketleap.theresumator.com/apply/ji9y0s/Senior-Softw...
